comments.raw_text:
Mentioned over in bug 673322, this bug is about improving the theming of the multi-message summary. Among other things, the goal is to use platform-derived colors, which will help keep us looking like we belong as well as making the interface more accessible. The attached patch uses CSS from my Mail Summaries add-on, so this is part one of importing Mail Summaries into Thunderbird proper.

I also made the message count a bit smaller and removed the boldface from the header so as to take up less space and be less "heavy" (and more consistent with Mail Summaries again).
